mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, PASSWORD, ENABLED, NAME, PROFILEPIC, SIGNFROM, AUTHOK FROM owl.MEMBER
SELECT EMAIL, PASSWORD, ENABLED, NAME, PROFILEPIC, SIGNFROM, AUTHOK FROM owl.MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO owl.MEMBER(email, password, name, profilepic, signfrom) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{profilePic}, '홈페이지')
mapper.update: UPDATE owl.MEMBER SET AUTHOK = 1 WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
